headline: You Can't Spell "Aggrieved Employees" Without An "I": PAGA Claims Cannot Be Headless
summary: In such cases, the plaintiff seeks civil penalties for all allegedly aggrieved employees except themself. Thus, these actions seek to circumvent the obligation to arbitrate an employee's individual...
